12.6.19  5:03 am   12.4.19  4:25 pm please talk more about reality tunnels i keep thinking about them

Â Â Â Â Â 2 people might look at the same picture, and one person thinks it's "a cat next to a moose", and the other person might think the picture is "a moose next to a cat" ...... our entire world is filled with nano seconds and pixels and colors, ... too many to actually list them all. So in order to actually describe anything, we have to take shortcuts, and make our own simplified interpretation of what we think we saw. when Time is involved, it complicates it even more. because each interpreter might be choosing different moments in time to be the most important. To make any sense of the world at all, we must describe things in ways that we can comprehend, rather than actually listing the location and status of every molecule at every point in time. Because of this, every person may seem to see the world differently ..... not because they actually see or hear any differently, but because when faced with infinite data points, there are infinite different ways to make sense of them, or choose which ones to even look at, and when

12.6.19  1:43 am   It feels like you won the internet game or are at least on the leaderboards. What's a pro tip for content that makes people happy? 

Â Â Â Â Â you have to figure out what content makes yourself happy, and if you can make that happen then it is likely that it may work on other people as long as they are a similar or same species as you
